entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
